hadiths.text: Narrated 'Ali: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited wearing Al-Qassi and what was dyed with 'Usfur." [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from Anas and 'Abdullah bin 'Amr

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْمُعَصْفَرِ لِلرِّجَالِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked For Men To Wear Garments Dyed With 'Usfur
